GK19ksbhm06u:2: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_6.1 //
GK19ksbhm06u:11: viṣamastho na hantavyo na ca senāvinirgataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:12: na nivṛtte raṇe ceti maryādāṃ cakrire nṛpāḥ // Bhmj_6.6 //
GK19ksbhm06u:17: divyaṃ gṛhāma nayanaṃ svayaṃ yuddhaṃ vilokaya /
GK19ksbhm06u:23: ayaṃ te nikhilaṃ yuddhaṃ kathayiṣyati saṃjayaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:27: saureṇa pīḍitā gāḍhaṃ rohiṇī jvalitā diśaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:30: kimanyadrājamahiṣī hā mahī na bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_6.15 //
GK19ksbhm06u:32: lakṣavyaktaṃ jayasyaitaddharmo yatrāsti tatra saḥ // Bhmj_6.16 //
GK19ksbhm06u:34: taralā hyasidhāreyaṃ niścayo nātra gaṇyate // Bhmj_6.17 //
GK19ksbhm06u:36: papraccha dvīpasaṃsthānaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭho 'bhyabhāṣata // Bhmj_6.18 //
GK19ksbhm06u:38: sphāraṃ sudarśanaṃ dvīpaṃ nikhilaṃ pratibimbitam // Bhmj_6.19 //
GK19ksbhm06u:49: sthānaṃ sukṛtināṃ yatra vikhyātā gaṇḍikā iti // Bhmj_6.24 //
GK19ksbhm06u:69: matvā jagāda govindaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ karuṇānidhiḥ // Bhmj_6.33 //
GK19ksbhm06u:70: aho vata vimūḍhānāṃ rājyaleśe sukhāya naḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:78: akāṇḍe dhairyasārasya keyaṃ kātaratā tava // Bhmj_6.37 //
GK19ksbhm06u:80: nijāṃ kulasthitiṃ pārtha na dharmyāṃ hātumarhasi // Bhmj_6.38 //
GK19ksbhm06u:81: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā nityaṃ dehena dehinam /
GK19ksbhm06u:84: dehino 'sya tathā dehāḥ sataḥ sattāvivarjitāḥ // Bhmj_6.40 //
GK19ksbhm06u:86: sahate yo viluptātmā nirvāṇaṃ tasya śāśvatam // Bhmj_6.41 //
GK19ksbhm06u:90: sata evāsya satataṃ na virāmaḥ śarīriṇaḥ // Bhmj_6.43 //
GK19ksbhm06u:92: jayājayau samaṃ matvā viśa svargonmukho raṇam // Bhmj_6.44 //
GK19ksbhm06u:110: sa mahābdhirivākṣobhyaḥ sthitiṃ brāhmīṃ prapadyate // Bhmj_6.53 //
GK19ksbhm06u:115: karma durmatiyogyaṃ māṃ praśaṃsasi vimohayan // Bhmj_6.55 //
GK19ksbhm06u:122: śreyo hyakarmaṇaḥ karma na yajñaḥ karmaṇā vinā /
GK19ksbhm06u:133: taranti hi tamo ghoraṃ nityaṃ manmatavartinaḥ // Bhmj_6.64 //
GK19ksbhm06u:138: iti pṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśo jagāda jagatāṃ patiḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:145: yasya taṃ duḥsahaṃ śatruṃ kāmarūpa vināśaya // Bhmj_6.70 //
GK19ksbhm06u:147: sūryeṇāptaḥ purā matto yogo 'yaṃ manunā tataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:150: na tatsmṛtipathaṃ yātaṃ kiṃtu te prāktanaṃ vapuḥ // Bhmj_6.72 //
GK19ksbhm06u:151: ahaṃ tu nityadharamasya sthitaye guptaye satām /
GK19ksbhm06u:152: yuge yuge bhavāmyeṣa vināśāya dṛrātmanām // Bhmj_6.73 //
GK19ksbhm06u:154: tvamapyasakto niṣkāmaḥ kuru karma kulocitam // Bhmj_6.74 //
GK19ksbhm06u:156: svocitaṃ phalahīnaṃ ca viruddhaṃ ceti bhedataḥ // Bhmj_6.75 //
GK19ksbhm06u:158: jānātyakarmaṇaḥ pāpātkarma yaśca sa buddhimān // Bhmj_6.76 //
GK19ksbhm06u:164: tatkarmāṇyātmayogāgnau hutvā yānti parāṃ gatim // Bhmj_6.79 //
GK19ksbhm06u:166: prāṇāpānādiha viṣo dhṛtvā nāḍīṣu dhāraṇam // Bhmj_6.80 //
GK19ksbhm06u:168: te prayānti paraṃ dhāma yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtāśinaḥ // Bhmj_6.81 //
GK19ksbhm06u:172: kālena śraddadhānānāṃ svayaṃ jñānaṃ prasīdati // Bhmj_6.83 //
GK19ksbhm06u:179: karmayogastu saṃnyāsādviśiṣṭa iti me matiḥ // Bhmj_6.86 //
GK19ksbhm06u:181: saktā api na sajjanti paṅke ravikarā iva // Bhmj_6.87 //
GK19ksbhm06u:183: ajñānapihite jñāne kiṃ tveṣā karmavāsanā // Bhmj_6.88 //
GK19ksbhm06u:185: brāhmaṇe vā śvapāke vā vibudhāḥ samadṛṣṭayaḥ // Bhmj_6.89 //
GK19ksbhm06u:189: nāsāntare samau dhṛtvā prāṇāpānau vimuktaye // Bhmj_6.91 //
GK19ksbhm06u:200: manaḥ saṃyamya paśyanti sravatyetadyato yataḥ // Bhmj_6.96 //
GK19ksbhm06u:201: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca sarvatra mamātmani tathākhilam /
GK19ksbhm06u:204: etadākarṇya kaunteyaḥ punaḥ papraccha keśavam // Bhmj_6.98 //
GK19ksbhm06u:208: ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhaṃ divyaṃ sa kalyāṇapuraḥ saraḥ // Bhmj_6.100 //
GK19ksbhm06u:209: bhogināṃ yogināṃ vāpi saṃbhūto mahatāṃ kule /
GK19ksbhm06u:211: tapo jñānādhikaṃ yogaṃ tasmādyogī bhavārjuna // Bhmj_6.101 //
GK19ksbhm06u:213: mayi nyastamanā nityaṃ bhaktyā māṃ vetti mānava /
GK19ksbhm06u:216: sarve matprāṇitā bhāvā mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // Bhmj_6.103 //
GK19ksbhm06u:217: devīṃ māyāṃ dadhānaṃ māṃ na jānāti vimohitaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:218: ye tu jānanti māṃ māyāṃ bhavanti kṛtinaḥ sadā // Bhmj_6.104 //
GK19ksbhm06u:219: arthī jijñāsurārto vā jñānī vā māṃ prapadyate /
GK19ksbhm06u:220: priyaḥ priyasya satataṃ jñāninastvasmi gocare // Bhmj_6.105 //
GK19ksbhm06u:222: vāsudevaḥ sarvamiti yajante māṃ mumukṣavaḥ // Bhmj_6.106 //
GK19ksbhm06u:233: paryante bhāvatulyā hi nṛṇāṃ janmāntarasthitiḥ // Bhmj_6.111 //
GK19ksbhm06u:235: parastāttamaso nityaṃ ye smaranti raviprabham // Bhmj_6.112 //
GK19ksbhm06u:237: omityekākṣaraṃ brahma japanto yānti te param // Bhmj_6.113 //
GK19ksbhm06u:239: paraṃ māṃ pratipannāste na bhavanti bhave punaḥ // Bhmj_6.114 //
GK19ksbhm06u:246: sarvakartari bhūtāni mayi santi na teṣvaham /
GK19ksbhm06u:247: lokāḥ sthitā na sthitāśca mayi vyomnīva vāyavaḥ // Bhmj_6.117 //
GK19ksbhm06u:249: asaktaṃ māṃ na jānanti malināmoghadarśinaḥ // Bhmj_6.118 //
GK19ksbhm06u:250: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ yajñaṃ vedyaṃ bījaṃ bhavābhavam /
GK19ksbhm06u:257: bhūyo 'pi me śṛṇu sakhe prītyā yatpratibodhyase /
GK19ksbhm06u:258: na tattvenāmaragaṇā munayo vā vidanti mām // Bhmj_6.122 //
GK19ksbhm06u:260: tadahaṃ sarvabhūtātmā na hi kiṃcinmayā vinā // Bhmj_6.123 //
GK19ksbhm06u:266: kiṃtu viśvamayaṃ rūpaṃ draṣṭumicchami te vibho // Bhmj_6.125 //
GK19ksbhm06u:276: draṣṭuṃ tadeva paryantarahitaṃ notsahe vapuḥ // Bhmj_6.130 //
GK19ksbhm06u:288: dīptyā dravanti rakṣāṃsi sthāne tava janārdana // Bhmj_6.136 //
GK19ksbhm06u:290: anantaṃ śāśvataṃ dhāma sarvātmānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_6.137 //
GK19ksbhm06u:292: ukto 'si kṛṣṇa govinda yādaveti purā mayā // Bhmj_6.138 //
GK19ksbhm06u:295: prasīda darśaya vibho vapuḥ saumyaṃ tadeva me /
GK19ksbhm06u:296: śāntiṃ me yāti sahasā nānyatā vyathitaṃ manaḥ // Bhmj_6.140 //
GK19ksbhm06u:299: devā api na paśyanti mamedaṃ sarvagaṃ vapuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:303: avyaktamakṣaraṃ ye ca teṣāṃ ke 'dhikayoginaḥ // Bhmj_6.143 //
GK19ksbhm06u:310: vaśe yadi na te cittamabhyāsena gṛhāṇa tat /
GK19ksbhm06u:311: tatrāpyaśakto matkarmā satataṃ śreyase bhava // Bhmj_6.147 //
GK19ksbhm06u:316: udāsīnaḥ śucirdakṣaḥ kṣamī bhaktaḥ priyo mama /
GK19ksbhm06u:319: kṣetraṃ tatsavikāraṃ tu māyā bhūtādi ca sthitam // Bhmj_6.150 //
GK19ksbhm06u:323: jñeyaṃ tu manmayaṃ brahma śuddhaṃ sadasatoḥ param // Bhmj_6.152 //
GK19ksbhm06u:326: prakṛtiḥ karaṇe heturbhoktā tu puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:328: tatsaṃgamācca vistāraṃ sa yāti brahma śāśvatam /
GK19ksbhm06u:330: bhautike 'pi sthitaḥ kāye sarvavyāpī na lipyate // Bhmj_6.155 //
GK19ksbhm06u:336: sattvaṃ prakāśakaṃ jñeyaṃ yadutthaiḥ stambhakaṃ rajaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:339: guṇadoṣāśca dṛśyante te te kila śarīriṇām // Bhmj_6.159 //
GK19ksbhm06u:346: svabhāvabhūmāvavṛtaṃ jānīte yaḥ sa vedavit // Bhmj_6.162 //
GK19ksbhm06u:352: paśyanti jñāninaḥ sarvajagatāṃ jīvanaṃ param // Bhmj_6.165 //
GK19ksbhm06u:354: manmayā dhṛtimanto māṃ bhajante puruṣottamam // Bhmj_6.166 //
GK19ksbhm06u:356: abhīḥ sattvaṃ śucirjñānaṃ damo dānaṃ tapaḥ kratuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:360: yukto 'pi satataṃ divyasaṃpadā mā śucaḥ sakhe /
GK19ksbhm06u:370: ma(sa)tkarma na parityājyaṃ tyājyaṃ tu vidhigarhitam // Bhmj_6.173 //
GK19ksbhm06u:375: karma kartā ca buddhiśca trividhā guṇabhedataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:376: dhṛtiḥ sukhaṃ ca traiguṇyāttrividhaṃ dehināṃ matam // Bhmj_6.175 //
GK19ksbhm06u:377: yathoktasevī niḥsaṅgaḥ kuru karma nijaṃ sakhe /
GK19ksbhm06u:379: idaṃ bhaktāya te jñānamupadiṣṭaṃ mayā svayam /
GK19ksbhm06u:391: yācñā kṛtāñjalirupaiti parānyadeṣa śūrāstadiṅgitajaḍāḥ pṛthagityavocan // Bhmj_6.182 //
GK19ksbhm06u:393: tatpādalagnamukuṭaḥ prakaṭaṃ praṇamya lebhe tadāśiṣamaśeṣamahīpajaitrīm // Bhmj_6.183 //
GK19ksbhm06u:395: abhyāyayau tava sutaḥ svakurūnnirasya dhāvanti tulyagumameva nṛṇāṃ manāṃsi // Bhmj_6.184 //
GK19ksbhm06u:403: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vīrairdhunāno vipulaṃ dhanuḥ // Bhmj_6.188 //
GK19ksbhm06u:407: duḥśāsano 'pi nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca durmukhaḥ // Bhmj_6.190 //
GK19ksbhm06u:418: anye ca vīrā rājāno rājasiṃhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:437: unmamātha śarāgreṇa haimaṃ kesariṇaṃ rathāt // Bhmj_6.205 //
GK19ksbhm06u:440: sa kuñjarendraḥ śalyasya pādena caturo hayān /
GK19ksbhm06u:442: tato madrādhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śaktiṃ śaktimatāṃ varaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:448: tasya śalyo 'tha gadayā vidārya dalaśo ratham /
GK19ksbhm06u:450: śaṅkho hatāśvaḥ sahasā phalguṇasya rathaṃ yayau /
GK19ksbhm06u:460: kṣīyamāṇasya samare satyaṃ śreyastapo mama // Bhmj_6.216 //
GK19ksbhm06u:462: ko mucyeta raṇe prāpya bhīṣmaṃ bhīṣmaparākramam // Bhmj_6.217 //
GK19ksbhm06u:464: dhruvaste vijayo rājanyasya yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_6.218 //
GK19ksbhm06u:466: saubhadraśca raṇe kruddho hanyādeva gaṇānapi // Bhmj_6.219 //
GK19ksbhm06u:468: mithaḥ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ sā jagāma vibhāvarī // Bhmj_6.220 //
GK19ksbhm06u:484: niruddhāṃ śarajālena nādṛśyanta diśo daśa // Bhmj_6.228 //
GK19ksbhm06u:485: na dadarśa tayoḥ kaścidantaraṃ kṣipatoḥ śarān /
GK19ksbhm06u:502: dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājā sānugaḥ svayamādravat // Bhmj_6.237 //
GK19ksbhm06u:506: jahnuḥ śirāṃsi śūrāṇāṃ phalānīva mahīruhām // Bhmj_6.239 //
GK19ksbhm06u:510: avahāraṃ raṇe cakre vāsarānte pitāmahaḥ // Bhmj_6.241 //
GK19ksbhm06u:531: hṛdi viddho nimagnena mumoha bhṛśavihvalaḥ // Bhmj_6.251 //
GK19ksbhm06u:535: pratyudyayau samāśvasya tūrṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_6.253 //
GK19ksbhm06u:541: madabhāgyavaśānna syādyadi pārtheṣu vaḥ kṛpā // Bhmj_6.256 //
GK19ksbhm06u:545: yattu śakyaṃ mayā kiṃcidvṛddhenādya karomi kim // Bhmj_6.258 //
GK19ksbhm06u:557: ekenaikena bāṇena bhinneṣu triṣu dantiṣu // Bhmj_6.264 //
GK19ksbhm06u:576: uvāca sātyakiṃ vīraṃ yudhyamānaṃ prayatnataḥ // Bhmj_6.273 //
GK19ksbhm06u:577: tiṣṭhantu yāntu vā sarve sātyake pṛtanāgragāḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:578: eṣa svayaṃ nihanmyadya sānugaṃ śantanoḥ sutam // Bhmj_6.274 //
GK19ksbhm06u:582: na rūpaṃ sehire draṣṭuṃ surā api divi sthitāḥ // Bhmj_6.276 //
GK19ksbhm06u:584: śobhāṃ bheje sa nīlādreḥ sarpatsaṃdhyābhraśālinaḥ // Bhmj_6.277 //
GK19ksbhm06u:586: dhīraḥ śāntanavo dṛṣṭvā dhunāno dhanurabhyadhāt // Bhmj_6.278 //
GK19ksbhm06u:590: hato jagannivāsena dhanyatāṃ yātvayaṃ janaḥ // Bhmj_6.280 //
GK19ksbhm06u:594: uvāca saṃhara vibho kopaṃ viśvakṣayocitam // Bhmj_6.282 //
GK19ksbhm06u:596: iti prasādya taṃ pārtho rathamāropayatpunaḥ // Bhmj_6.283 //
GK19ksbhm06u:610: saṃdhyayā dikṣu jātāsu śoṇitena bhṛtāsviva // Bhmj_6.290 //
GK19ksbhm06u:612: māṃsapiṇḍa iva graste ghoreṇa dhvāntarakṣasā // Bhmj_6.291 //
GK19ksbhm06u:628: sa hatvā cāmaraṃ śūraḥ pauravyatanayaṃ nṛpam /
GK19ksbhm06u:657: śabdena tasthurālīya sarve saṃkucitā gajāḥ // Bhmj_6.313 //
GK19ksbhm06u:661: saṃdhyāyāṃ durjayaṃ matvā bhīṣmastaṃ bhīmavikramam // Bhmj_6.315 //
GK19ksbhm06u:668: devena viṣṇunā guptā na jeyāḥ pāṇḍavā iti // Bhmj_6.318 //
GK19ksbhm06u:670: prādurbhūtaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇuṃ tuṣṭāva sahasāṃ nidhim // Bhmj_6.319 //
GK19ksbhm06u:677: avatīrṇā bhuvaṃ nātha dānavā ye hatāstvayā /
GK19ksbhm06u:678: teṣāṃ vadhāya dṛptānāṃ mānuṣī tanumāviśa // Bhmj_6.323 //
GK19ksbhm06u:679: iti stutāḥ padmabhuvā devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:682: naraśca vijayo dhīraḥ pravaraḥ sarvadhanvinām // Bhmj_6.325 //
GK19ksbhm06u:684: iti jñātvā śamaḥ putra kriyatāṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ // Bhmj_6.326 //
GK19ksbhm06u:688: hatānāṃ hanyamānānāṃ ghnatāṃ ca samare mithaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:691: bhīṣmamukhyaiśca te sene bhinne saṃśayamāpatuḥ // Bhmj_6.329 //
GK19ksbhm06u:716: vimohaṃ vidadhe teṣāṃ mohanāstreṇa pārṣanaḥ // Bhmj_6.341 //
GK19ksbhm06u:722: hṛdi nirdārito bheje mūrchāṃ vyathitamānasaḥ // Bhmj_6.344 //
GK19ksbhm06u:735: unnanāda dhanadhvāno rathamasya jaghāna ca // Bhmj_6.350 //
GK19ksbhm06u:736: sa hatāśvaṃ samutsṛjya rathaṃ putrasya saṃbhramāt /
GK19ksbhm06u:753: mādrīsutau tataḥ śalyaṃ vidhāya virathaṃ śaraiḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:755: svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā nṛpaṃ jitvā śrutāyudham /
GK19ksbhm06u:756: vigāhya kauravānīkaṃ vidadhe vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_6.360 //
GK19ksbhm06u:762: pārthena ca trigarteṣu jagāmāstaṃ divākaraḥ // Bhmj_6.363 //
GK19ksbhm06u:771: droṇasya ca samudbhrāntapatākaṃ vidadhe ratham // Bhmj_6.367 //
GK19ksbhm06u:775: mahodaraṃ maṇḍitakaṃ sunābhaṃ ca nihatya tān // Bhmj_6.369 //
GK19ksbhm06u:777: kṣayāya sarvajagatāṃ devai rudra ivoditaḥ // Bhmj_6.370 //
GK19ksbhm06u:781: uktaḥ purā surapure tāṃ yuddhabhuvamāyayau // Bhmj_6.372 //
GK19ksbhm06u:789: sa niṣaṅgaṃ dhanurdīptaṃ nanāda balināṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_6.376 //
GK19ksbhm06u:790: tato māyāṃ samāśritya mahatīṃ mohanīṃ nṛṇām /
GK19ksbhm06u:791: yuyudhāte samāviśya tau nabho bhīmavikramau // Bhmj_6.377 //
GK19ksbhm06u:795: tadvamanto viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhogānbhogabhṛtāṃ varāḥ // Bhmj_6.379 //
GK19ksbhm06u:801: rurāva yena vasudhā cacāla sakulācalā // Bhmj_6.382 //
GK19ksbhm06u:817: virāṭaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca subāhuṃ kanakadhvajam // Bhmj_6.390 //
GK19ksbhm06u:826: śastraṃ nyāsaya gāṅgeyamahaṃ jeṣyāmi pāṇḍavān // Bhmj_6.394 //
GK19ksbhm06u:830: utthāya bhīṣmaśibiraṃ pratasthe bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Bhmj_6.396 //
GK19ksbhm06u:840: śayānaṃ ratnaparyaṅke praṇanāma vilokya tam // Bhmj_6.401 //
GK19ksbhm06u:844: bhujastrailokyavijaye paryāpta iti me matiḥ // Bhmj_6.403 //
GK19ksbhm06u:856: na sehire taṃ bhūpālā māninaḥ saṃhatā api // Bhmj_6.409 //
GK19ksbhm06u:860: nipetuḥ sahasā yodhā bahavo vigatāsavaḥ // Bhmj_6.411 //
GK19ksbhm06u:861: draupadeyaiḥ puraḥ prāptaiḥ sa vidhāya raṇaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK19ksbhm06u:879: khadyotā iva vṛkṣeṣu śalabhā iva śāliṣu /
GK19ksbhm06u:882: cakāra samare bhīṣmaḥ svayaśoviṣadā diśaḥ // Bhmj_6.422 //
GK19ksbhm06u:886: rājñāṃ hatānāṃ bhīṣmeṇa jīvā iva nabhaścarāḥ // Bhmj_6.424 //
GK19ksbhm06u:902: yasya tvaṃ jagatāṃ nātho vadhāya svayamudyataḥ // Bhmj_6.432 //
GK19ksbhm06u:904: avaruhya tataḥ kṛṣṇamānināya rathaṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_6.433 //
GK19ksbhm06u:911: jagāda rājakaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhinnaṃ bhīṣmeṇa duḥkhitaḥ // Bhmj_6.436 //
GK19ksbhm06u:916: alaṃ rājyena me tāvaditi vādini dharmaje /
GK19ksbhm06u:919: pālayāmi raṇe bhīṣmaṃ paśyatāṃ jagatībhujām // Bhmj_6.440 //
GK19ksbhm06u:923: sa hi māmāśiṣā pūrvaṃ vātsalyātsamayojayat // Bhmj_6.442 //
GK19ksbhm06u:924: iti niścitya kṛṣṇena bhrātṛbhiśca sahāśu kṛt /
GK19ksbhm06u:927: papraccha vijayopāyaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭastamabravīt // Bhmj_6.444 //
GK19ksbhm06u:928: na taṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu vīro māṃ vijayeta yaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:929: jayalābhe ca yuṣmākaṃ mayi jīvati kā kathā // Bhmj_6.445 //
GK19ksbhm06u:930: na viśastrena saṃtraste na strīpūrve mameṣavaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:931: patanti tasmātklīvena māṃ ghātaya śikhaṇḍinā // Bhmj_6.446 //
GK19ksbhm06u:933: akāma iva duḥkhena yayau svaśibiraṃ nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_6.447 //
GK19ksbhm06u:943: yudhi yudhyasva vā mā vā na me jīvangamiṣyasi // Bhmj_6.452 //
GK19ksbhm06u:956: vadhāya kuru kaunteya yatnaṃ me nṛpatikṣayāt /
GK19ksbhm06u:957: viṣaṇṇo 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ putra raudreṇānena karmaṇā // Bhmj_6.459 //
GK19ksbhm06u:959: sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ somakaiśca sahādravan // Bhmj_6.460 //
GK19ksbhm06u:961: āvārya bhīṣmarakṣāyai dvandvaṃ yuddhāni cakrire // Bhmj_6.461 //
GK19ksbhm06u:970: vimānā iva gāṅgeyo mahāstraṃ saṃjahāra tat /
GK19ksbhm06u:977: chidyamāneṣu bāleṣu tasya tūrṇaṃ kirīṭinā // Bhmj_6.469 //
GK19ksbhm06u:979: śaikhaṇḍīṃ śaramālāṃ tāṃ śairoṣīmiva peśalām // Bhmj_6.470 //
GK19ksbhm06u:986: viśanti mama marmāṇi bilaṃ viṣadharā iva /
GK19ksbhm06u:989: ityuktvā pāṇḍuputrāya śaktiṃ cikṣepa śaktimān // Bhmj_6.475 //
GK19ksbhm06u:999: tato nivṛtte saṃgrāme hāhākāre nabhaḥspṛśiḥ // Bhmj_6.480 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1007: sthito 'smīti ca gāṅgeyo nigadya yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_6.484 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1011: dhāraṇaṃ lambamānasya śiraso me vidhīyatām // Bhmj_6.486 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1013: jagrāha śāsanāttasya tribhiḥ pārthaḥ śaraiḥ śiraḥ // Bhmj_6.487 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1015: pāṇḍavaiḥ kriyatāṃ saṃdhirityuvāca ca kauravam // Bhmj_6.488 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1026: bhajasva pārtheṣu śamaṃ vīrāste bhrātarastava // Bhmj_6.493 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1028: jāne sarvamavaśyaṃ tu bhavitavyamidaṃ prabho // Bhmj_6.494 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1030: anujānīhi māṃ tāta samarāya samudyatam // Bhmj_6.495 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1034: patihitamanīkaṃ sāmyamāpa drutānāṃ sarayapavanapānīkampitānāṃ vanānām // Bhmj_6.497 //
